reviewText: I'm about halfway through this series. Very practical knowledge on how to interact with a crowd and build a stage show that accomplishes a specific purpose. He talks a lot about building "moments" into your live show, and how to go about doing this. This is the older VCR version, which was cheaper than buying his new DVD series. As to be expected, it seems a little dated style-wise, but the content is definitely relevant. One other thing that may not be obvious is that this series was created with christian music in mind, although it could be applied to most other music as well.
